segments.text: I see the water spilling everywhere, and I’m shocked the woman hasn’t noticed yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, but she’s just polishing that plate like nothing’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, and it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool, and it’s making me cringe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is encouraging him, which is not helping.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is a mess, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will take for someone to slip and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so serene, like a completely different world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how unaware the woman is of everything happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just waiting to explode.
segments.speaker: PAR
